item.title: In archlinux, chrome cannot be displayed normally under AMD.
Fix a grub bug
item.description: In this article, I will record how to fix the problem that grub can’t find Windows on nvme. So that someday, I can reuse this to help myself. First of all, install os-prober. Then, run update-grub or grub-mkconfig. Then you will find that os-prober is not working. It will print a warning saying like: OS-PROBER will not be executed in order to protect xxx. If you want to know more, please look GRUB-DISABLE-OR-PROBER document to find more information.
